EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Reminder: 4 Rules to Re-Energize Your Career in 2013
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}},
Don't forget to register for our January 10th webinar entitled "Disrupt Yourself: Four Rules for Reinventing Your Career in 2013 <http://info.mbopartners.com/Jan10WebDisrupt-Yourself.html>" today!
This new year webinar will feature author and disruptive innovation expert, Whitney Johnson. Whitney will walk you through how to challenge your "normal," push yourself to disrupt your own status quo, and achieve greater professional success using techniques from her Harvard Business Review article Disrupt YourselfÂ®.
Register today <http://info.mbopartners.com/Jan10WebDisrupt-Yourself.html> to re-invent your professional path in 2013.
___________________________________
MBO Partners
t: 1-800-220-0469 e: info@mbopartners.com <mailto:info@mbopartners.com>
